descriptionHtml:
····················
Skyrim mod
····················



What is it?
--------------------------

This is a brand new retexture of the notorious villian Jack of blades from one of my favourite role playing game of all time (Fable 1) 
Two dragonpriest helmets have been retextured one is light armour and one is heavy armour which includes the Vokun helmet and the Krosis helmet also included is retextured hood that goes with them.


http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1234

Download this mod whick enables you to craft them at a blacksmiths anvil using dragonscales and/or dragonbone.

Alternatively you can typ in these command console lines to obtain them instantly:
Vokun 00061CC9
Krosis 00061CB9

As i understand there is already a jack of blades armour retexture however it cannot be completed until the construction sets release and so i am not doing any armour retextures because of this because
 we dont want jack of blades running around everywhere :P

How do I install it?
--------------------------

Just unpack the files in your data folder and overwrite if prompted overwrite.


Compatibility
--------------------------

This is only a retex, so there are no compatibility issues except with mods that alter the same files as this one.


Future release
==========================
**************************

This at the moment is just the textures for the mask however a set of samurai swords are in the process and upon release of the long awaited construction kit i plan to recreate his armour and more importantly the sword of aeons.
This mask and jack of blades other two masks masks (Hate and Insanity) will be unique masks with unique strengths when the construction kit comes out but for now this is all i can do.

Feel free to contact me about any ideas for fable rebuild mods and i will certainly think them over.
author: F16UR3 4

files.name: jack of blades mask addon Insanity
